title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
subtitle: From the Beginning of Time to the Present
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: Sapiens explores the history of humankind, tracing our evolution from hunter-gatherers to modern society and examining the significant forces that have shaped our world.

title: The Story of Art
subtitle: A Global View
author: E.H. Gombrich
description: The Story of Art is a compelling introduction to the world of art, covering major artistic movements and figures from prehistoric times to the present day.

title: Mathematics: A Very Short Introduction
subtitle: An Overview of Mathematical Ideas
author: Timothy Gowers
description: This book provides a concise overview of mathematical ideas, explaining concepts ranging from basic arithmetic to advanced calculus in an accessible manner.

title: The Great Gatsby
subtitle: A Novel
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: The Great Gatsby tells the story of Jay Gatsby, a wealthy man whose love for the beautiful Daisy Buchanan leads him into a world of obsession and tragedy during the Jazz Age.

title: The Diary of a Young Girl
subtitle: By Anne Frank
author: Anne Frank
description: The Diary of a Young Girl is the poignant account of Anne Frank, a Jewish teenager hiding from the Nazis during World War II, as she documents her thoughts and experiences.
